resources.string: An open source collection of simple Android apps

101 Android Apps is an open source repository of simple Android apps. For more information about specific apps do a long click on the chosen app in this menu, or click the info menu button when inside the app.
 
 The complete source of these apps is available at:
 https://www.github.com/Hulzenga
